title: COLLECTIVE

title: MongoDB's Internal Wiki
summary: While serving as technical program manager for MongoDB's driver teams, I helped lead the charge to redesign our Confluence wiki to promote better UX and information accessibility.

title: Pegasystems' Internal Dashboards
summary: While serving as an engineer and later a scrum master at Pegasystems, I helped lead the charge to create data visualizations for internal use with the goal of giving engineering teams insight into their own practices.

summary: Interface design for Starbucks' speculative ordering kiosk.

title: Apportech by VFT Design
summary: Course capstone, product research and design for novel gardening tool.

title: Neuromarketing Lesson

title: MilkCrate
longTitle: No More Milk Crates: The Importance of Music Library Design in the Digital Age
summary: Product design for experimental music library mobile application.

title: The Vinyl Revival
summary: Research paper exploring the recent surge in popularity of vinyl records.

title: StrumBuddy

title: Turntable CAD
summary: CAD mockup of the Orbit turntable using SketchUp.

title: This Song Takes Me Back
summary: Research paper exploring the effects of music therapy on Alzheimer's patients.

title: Music Theory Trainer
summary: Interactive music theory training program written in VBA using Microsoft Office's UI capabilities. I completed this project for my freshman year musical instrument engineering course. We made the circuit diagram and build from scratch and wrote a corresponding MATLAB program to process the user input and play back a 12 tone scale.

title: Breadboard Synth
summary: Functional synthesizer built on a breadboard and run through a custom MATLAB program.
